summary.span: Gets or sets an instance of a public class, implemented by the host application, that can be accessed by script from a hosted document.

span.span: Gets or sets an instance of a public class, implemented by the host application, that can be accessed by script from a hosted document.

value.span: 的实例，它是类，实现主机应用程序，可由寄宿文档的脚本访问。

span.span: The that is an instance of a class, implemented by the host application, that can be accessed by script from a hosted document.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性可以设置为任何 COM 可见的对象，你希望其公共属性和方法可用于脚本代码。This property can be set to any COM-visible object for which you want its public properties and methods available to scripting code. 你可以通过将其与标记使 COM 可见类。You can make a class COM-visible by marking it with the . 为脚本被公开到当前文档的设置的对象[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_html](~/includes/tla2sharptla-html-md.md)]DOM 使用`window.external`属性。The object that is set for scripting is exposed to the current document by the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_html](~/includes/tla2sharptla-html-md.md)] DOM using the `window.external` property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`noCache`是`true`、通过发送控制而不进行缓存验证的刷新"Pragma:no-缓存"到服务器的标头。If `noCache` is `true`, the control refreshes without cache validation by sending a "Pragma:no-cache" header to the server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置源属性会导致以导航到指定的文档。Setting the source property causes to navigate to the document specified by the . 如果是`null`，显示一个空白文档 ("关于： 空白")。If the is `null`, a blank document is displayed ("about:blank"). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何配置以导航到[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_html](~/includes/tla2sharptla-html-md.md)]只使用标记的文档。The following example shows how to configure to navigate to an [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_html](~/includes/tla2sharptla-html-md.md)] document by using markup only. ```xaml ```
